flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Because the longnhair all over itsnbody obscures itsfsight, it justnkeeps chargingnrepeatedly.
If it charges atnan enemy, thenhairs on its backfstand up straight.nIt is very sensi­ntive to sound.
Although its legsnare short, itsnrugged hoovesfprevent it fromnslipping, even onnicy ground.
PILOSWINE is covered by a thick coatnof long hair that enables it to endurenthe freezing cold.fThis POKéMON uses its tusks to dig upnfood that has been buried under ice.
PILOSWINE is covered by a thick coatnof long hair that enables it to endurenthe freezing cold.fThis POKéMON uses its tusks to dig upnfood that has been buried under ice.
A PILOSWINE is covered by a thick coatnof long hair for enduring freezing cold.nIt uses its tusks to dig up food that hasnbeen buried under ice.
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs onnits back stand up straight. It is verynsensitive to sound.
Because the long hair all over its bodynobscures its sight, it just keeps chargingnrepeatedly.
Its shaggy coat makes it unablento see. It checks surroundingsnwith its sensitive nose instead.
Its shaggy coat makes it unablento see. It checks surroundingsnwith its sensitive nose instead.
Covered by a shaggy coat, it isnstrong against the cold. Its tusksnof ice thicken when it snows.
Because the long hair all over itsnbody obscures its sight, it justnkeeps charging repeatedly.
If it charges at an enemy, thenhairs on its back stand up straight.nIt is very sensitive to sound.
Il est protégé du froid mordant parnson épais manteau de fourrure. Sesncornes sont formées de glace.
Covered by a shaggy coat, it isnstrong against the cold. Its tusksnof ice thicken when it snows.
Il est protégé du froid mordant parnson épais manteau de fourrure. Sesncornes sont formées de glace.
Covered by a shaggy coat, it isnstrong against the cold. Its tusksnof ice thicken when it snows.
With its excellent sense of smell,nit’s even able to find mushrooms thatnare buried under frozen ground.
With its excellent sense of smell,nit’s even able to find mushrooms thatnare buried under frozen ground.
４ほんの　あしは　みじかいがnヒヅメは　ひろく　ギザギザ　なのでnゆきのうえでも　すべらず　あるける。
4개의 다리는 짧지만n발굽이 넓고 거칠거칠하므로n눈 위도 미끄러지지 않고 걸을 수 있다.
Bien que pourvu de courtes pattes, ses sabots sontnpointus pour l’empêcher de glisser sur la glace.
Trotz kurzer Beine rutscht es auf eisigen Flächennnicht aus, da seine Hufe ihm genügend Halt bieten.
Aunque tiene las patas cortas, las fuertes pezuñas lenpermiten agarrarse bien al suelo, a pesar del hielo.
Ha le zampe corte, ma grazie agli zoccoli ruvidi,nriesce a non scivolare neppure sul ghiaccio.
Although its legs are short, its rugged hoovesnprevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
４本の　脚は　短いがnひづめは　広く　ギザギザ　なのでn雪の上でも　滑らず　歩ける。
ながい　たいもうに　おおわれてnめのまえの　ようすが　わからずnひたすらに　とっしんを　くりかえす。
긴 털로 덮여 있어서n눈앞의 상태를 모르고n한결같이 돌진만을 반복한다.
Ses yeux sont masqués par ses longs poils. Il ne voitnrien et se déplace en chargeant.
Da sein haariges Fell seine Sicht enorm beeinträchtigt,ngreift es ständig an, um den Gegner zu treffen.
Como su largo pelaje le impide ver con claridad, siguenatacando repetidamente.
Poiché il lungo pelo sul suo corpo gli impedisce dinvedere, non fa che caricare il nemico senza tregua.
Because the long hair all over its body obscures itsnsight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
長い　体毛に　覆われてn目の前の　様子が　わからずnひたすらに　突進を　繰り返す。
こごえる　さむさにも　たえられる　ようにnあつくて　ながい　けがわに　おおわれている。nこおりに　うまった　エサを　キバで　ほりだす。
얼어붙는 추위에도 버틸 수 있도록n두껍고 긴 털가죽에 덮여 있다.n얼음에 묻힌 먹이를 이빨로 파낸다.
Cochignon est recouvert de longs poils épais qui luinpermettent de supporter le froid hivernal. Ce Pokémon utilisenses défenses pour déterrer la nourriture cachée sous la glace.
Keifel hat ein dichtes Fell aus langen Haaren. Dadurch istnes gegen eisige Kälte gewappnet. Dieses Pokémon benutztnseine Hauer, um an Nahrung zu gelangen, die unter dem Eisneingeschlossen ist.

Piloswine está cubierto por un pelaje tupido y de largasncerdas que le permite soportar el frío polar. Este Pokémonnusa los colmillos para desenterrar los alimentos que hayannpodido quedar bajo el hielo.
Piloswine è ricoperto da una fitta chioma di pelo lungonche lo aiuta a contrastare il freddo pungente. Usa le proprienzanne per scavare in cerca del cibo sepolto sotto i ghiacci.
Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables itnto endure the freezing cold. This Pokémon uses its tusks tondig up food that has been buried under ice.
凍える　寒さにも　耐えられる　ようにn厚くて　長い　毛皮に　覆われている。n氷に　埋まった　エサを　キバで　掘り出す。
こごえる　さむさにも　たえられる　ようにnあつくて　ながい　けがわに　おおわれている。nこおりに　うまった　エサを　キバで　ほりだす。
얼어붙는 추위에도 버틸 수 있도록n두껍고 긴 털가죽에 덮여 있다.n얼음에 묻힌 먹이를 이빨로 파낸다.
Cochignon est recouvert de longs poils épais qui luinpermettent de supporter le froid hivernal. Ce Pokémon utilisenses défenses pour déterrer la nourriture cachée sous la glace.
Keifel hat ein dichtes Fell aus langen Haaren. Dadurch istnes gegen eisige Kälte gewappnet. Dieses Pokémon benutztnseine Stoßzähne, um an Nahrung zu gelangen, die unter demnEis eingeschlossen ist.

Piloswine está cubierto por un pelaje tupido y de largasncerdas que le permite soportar el frío polar. Este Pokémonnusa los colmillos para desenterrar los alimentos que hayannpodido quedar bajo el hielo.
Piloswine è ricoperto da una fitta chioma di pelo lungonche lo aiuta a contrastare il freddo pungente. Usa le proprienzanne per scavare in cerca del cibo sepolto sotto i ghiacci.
Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enablesnit to endure the freezing cold. This Pokémon uses its tusks tondig up food that has been buried under ice.
凍える　寒さにも　耐えられる　ようにn厚くて　長い　毛皮に　覆われている。n氷に　埋まった　エサを　キバで　掘り出す。
あいて　めがけて　とっしんするときnせなかの　たいもうが　さかだつ。nおとに　ものすごく　びんかん。
상대를 목표로 삼고 돌진할 때n등에 있는 털이 곤두선다.n소리에 매우 민감하다.
朝著對手衝過去時，n背上的體毛會倒豎起來。n對聲音極度敏感。
S’il charge un ennemi, les poils de son dosnse dressent. Il est très sensible au bruit.
Beim Angriff auf einen Gegner stellen sich seinenRückenhaare auf. Es hört außergewöhnlich gut.
Cuando carga contra un enemigo, se le erizan losnpelos del lomo. Es muy sensible al sonido.
Quando carica il nemico, i peli gli si rizzanonsul dorso. È molto sensibile ai suoni.
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its backnstand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
相手　めがけて　突進するときn背中の　体毛が　逆立つ。n音に　ものすごく　敏感。
朝着对手冲过去时，n背上的体毛会倒竖起来。n对声音极度敏感。
４ほんの　あしは　みじかいがnヒヅメは　ひろく　ギザギザ　なのでnゆきのうえでも　すべらず　あるける。
4개의 다리는 짧지만n발굽이 넓고 거칠거칠하므로n눈 위도 미끄러지지 않고 걸을 수 있다.
雖然４隻腳很短，n但因為蹄很寬而且粗糙，n所以就算在雪地上行走也不會打滑。
Bien qu’il soit pourvu de pattes courtes,nses sabots larges et pointus l’empêchentnde glisser sur la glace.
Obwohl es sehr kurze Beine hat, rutscht es aufneisigen Flächen nicht aus, da seine gespaltenennHufe ihm genügend Halt bieten.
Aunque tiene las patas cortas, sus fuertesnpezuñas le permiten caminar por la nieve sinnresbalar.
Ha le zampe corte, ma grazie agli zoccoli ruvidinriesce a camminare sul ghiaccio senza scivolare.
Although its legs are short, its rugged hoovesnprevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
４本の　脚は　短いがnひづめは　広く　ギザギザ　なのでn雪の上でも　滑らず　歩ける。
虽然４只脚很短，n但因为蹄子很宽很粗糙，n所以就算在雪地上行走也不会打滑。
